name: MEC Bambini Toque - Infants
description:
A cozy toque made to keep wee noggins warm.Made from lightweight 100% polyester fleece.Flat-locked seams don't chafe against skin.Five-panel construction provides snug coverage.Coordinates with MEC Bambini Pullover, Leggings and Onesie.

        Sustainability
